title: ASML's Q3 2025 Financial Results and Outlook
body:
**ASML Reports Q3 2025 Financial Results**

On October 15, 2025, ASML Holding NV announced its third-quarter financial results, reporting total net sales of €7.5 billion and a net income of €2.1 billion. The gross margin for the quarter was 51.6%. The company also reported net bookings of €5.4 billion, with €3.6 billion attributed to Extreme Ultraviolet (EUV) systems. ([asml.com](https://www.asml.com/news/press-releases/2025/q3-2025-financial-results?utm_source=openai))

**Outlook and Guidance**

ASML provided guidance for the fourth quarter of 2025, expecting total net sales between €9.2 billion and €9.8 billion, with a gross margin between 51% and 53%. For the full year 2025, the company anticipates a total net sales increase of around 15% compared to 2024, with a gross margin of approximately 52%. ([asml.com](https://www.asml.com/news/press-releases/2025/q3-2025-financial-results?utm_source=openai))

**Dividend Announcement**

The company declared an interim dividend of €1.60 per ordinary share, payable on November 6, 2025. ([asml.com](https://www.asml.com/news/press-releases/2025/q3-2025-financial-results?utm_source=openai))

key_dates.title: Interim Dividend Payment
key_dates.importance_for_price: The dividend payment may attract income-focused investors, potentially supporting the stock price.

key_points.text: ASML reported Q3 2025 net sales of €7.5 billion and net income of €2.1 billion.
The company expects Q4 2025 net sales between €9.2 billion and €9.8 billion.
An interim dividend of €1.60 per share is payable on November 6, 2025.
